texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I wished I could forget all my past too.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Having things you'd rather forget constantly in your mind must be rough.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: That's why I'm writing about myself now. See, I finally started writing.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: A story about a lonely girl whose father failed to truly see her.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I want you to know me on a deeper level, Kaito.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: And I want to know you too.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I've decided. I don't want to wait anymore.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Someday, I'm sure you'll make something even more amazing.
